summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Beard Shampoo & Beard Wash - Man-Sized 8.45 OZ Bottle - Nourishing All Natural Oils - Cleans, Softens & Conditions - Premium Beard Soap
Review Date: 2016/09/22
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '6.4 x 2.7 x 1.6 inches; 14.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '646437251198'}
Review Text: Smells great!!! Great, refreshing eucalyptus scent, and you only have to use just a tiny bit to lather up your whole beard. Even if you have a very large one. If you want a great beard wash, this is definitely the best I've had.
Review Title: Awesome!!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Beard Oil - Tea Tree Scent - Huge Man-Sized 4 oz Bottle - 100% Natural - Softens Your Beard and Stops Itching - Scent Women Love - Best Beard Oil And Conditioner For Men
Review Date: 2016/11/08
Store: BEARDSMEN SPIRIT
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Liquid Volume': '4 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'BEARDSMEN SPIRIT', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '4.7 x 2 x 2 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '646437251228'}
Review Text: I LOVE Beardsmen's Bold Forest scent, but this one not so much. When I first put it on I was expecting a more tea tree scent but didn't really get that. It says that it also has peppermint in it but that is not what I smell I put it on. I don't know how I would describe it but my particular ol factories just don't care for it too much. And I really didn't care too much for their citrus sent either. But I really LOVE their Bold Forest scent, but for some reason they are out of stock or not making it or something. It is unavailable here on Amazon and it is also unavailable at their official website. When and if it becomes available I would recommend getting that one instead or just buy the uncensored version. As far as the oil itself you will not find a better one because it is nice and light and non-greasy yet makes your beard soft and shine.
Review Title: I LOVE Beardsmen's Bold Forest scent
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Beard Oil - Rousing Citrus Scent - Huge Man-Sized 4 oz Bottle - 100% Natural - Softens Your Beard and Stops Itching - Scent Women Love - Best Beard Oil And Conditioner For Men
Review Date: 2016/11/10
Store: BEARDSMEN SPIRIT
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Scent': 'Citrus', 'Liquid Volume': '4 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'BEARDSMEN SPIRIT', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '4.1 x 2 x 1.8 inches; 8 Ounces'}
Review Text: I like Beardsmen's Bold Forest the best, but to change it up a little bit I bought the Rousing Citrus. The Rousing Citrus isn't what you might expect. It is not that bright refreshing Citrus smell that you might be anticipating. It is more of a clove with citrus in the background. When you put it in your hands and onto your beard you smell the Citrus right away. But just as soon as you put it on your beard and rub it in the Citrus dissipate and there is a rather strong close scent. If you like the smell of clothes like I do then you will love it. If you don't then you will not like this sense at all. To be honest I had to use it about 3 or 4 times to really decide if I like it or not. So if you buy it and you used it for the first time and don't like it try it for another 3 or 4 days and see if you still don't like it. I think you'll find that it is a pretty good scent after all.
Review Title: I like Beardsmen's Bold Forest the best
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Keledz Hair Straightener Brush, Ionic Ceramic Fast Hair Straightening Comb with 5 Heating Setting Heating Function and LED Display, Anti Scald Ionic Brush (Black)
Review Date: 2019/06/15
Store: Keledz
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Keledz', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Heater Surface Material': 'Ceramic', 'Package Dimensions': '13 x 3.8 x 2 inches; 13.62 Ounces', 'UPC': '712424116822', 'Manufacturer': 'kele'}
Review Text: truth be told I have only used one but this is the only one I need to use from the performance that it is all really giving me a few times. It has three settings and I put mine on 355 I believe or whatever the middle setting is and I slowly brush my beard and it straightens it with perfection after about five or six go-rounds. There is a couple of brushes on the market for $100 or so which I think is ridiculous. This was about $27 and it works just as good as them. And the other ones are so small I would be afraid of burning myself while this one has quite a bit of a handle so you have better control in my opinion.
Review Title: The best beard straightening brush I've ever
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Live Bearded Pine, Cedar, Eucalyptus Beard Butter, The Wilderness All Natural Beard Butter 4 Fl Oz
Review Date: 2019/09/29
Store: Live Bearded
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '706970694163'}
Review Text: Well they discontinued THE WILDERNESS but I was lucky enough to find the last one available on Amazon! Now that they do not have this I recommend the new WINGMAN 2.0. a lot of guys did not like the strong close-set since the scent profile is orange and clove so they pulled back the clove scent and brought way forward the orange and citrus fragrance that makes it far much more appealing and attractive! and the great thing about live bearded is if you don't like it just call them and they will let you keep it and they will send you another one just because you said so. I would just be honest and not abused the privilege because they are such honest and good young men.
Review Title: I was lucky enough to get the last one available before they discontinued it.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:

    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details

    Structure your response as:
   
    SUMMARY:
    [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
This individual demonstrates a clear preference for all-natural grooming products, particularly those designed for beard care. Consistently high ratings appear for items with moisturizing qualities and pleasant, refreshing scents. Key ingredients mentioned include eucalyptus and various essential oils, with a significant emphasis on scent preference indicating a strong aversion to overpowering or unpleasant fragrances. 

Product use cases center around cleaning, softening, and grooming the beard, revealing a focused investment in maintaining personal grooming standards. The buyer displays a notable inclination towards value, favoring products that perform well at lower price points while expressing dissatisfaction towards pricier alternatives that do not meet their quality expectations.

Quality preferences lean towards products promising natural formulations with effective moisture retention and easy application, favoring items that enhance the grooming experience without excessive greasiness. Additionally, there's a tendency to seek out specific scent profiles, showcasing a loyalty to favored brands when these align with their demands. 

Overall, the individual values practicality, quality, and pleasant scents in grooming products. They are willing to invest in effective solutions but remain price-sensitive, seeking optimal performance without overspending.

target_interaction.title: It's okay depending on your nose.
target_interaction.text: tweeting I have had a beard for many years and used to like live bearded but I just don't really care for their products anymore. The guys who run it are great guys and they have a great brotherhood going but I just honestly don't like their products very much. the oils and the butters are nice but I just don't really like the smell anymore. Just a personal preference is all but the great thing about them is that if you buy from them you can always get a money back guarantee or a switch for something you think you might like. So always keep that in mind. It is hard to be this company as far as customer service.
target_interaction.title_meta: All Natural Beard Oil | Proudly Made in the USA | Live Bearded (The Wilderness - Light, Fresh Outdoorsy Scent)
